text: Jessie James Decker clearly had a lot of pride in her men when she posted a photo to Instagram on Monday. The 27 - year - old country singer shared a black - and - white image of her husband, 28 - year - old football player Eric Decker, holding the couple's four - day - old son, Eric Thomas Decker II. While baby Eric seemed to have a blanket covering his baby stomach, dad Eric was shirtless in the rather sexy photo.
